fields.name: BaseSizeTiB
fields.description: Base size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

fields.name: ExtendedCapacitySizeTiB
fields.description: Extended size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
fields.description: Allow or disallow public network access to ElasticSan Account. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'.
